item.title: Reticulate: Using R Studio and Python Together
item.description: Working with Reticulate If you didn't know, the reticulated python is one of the longest and heaviest snakes found in Southeast and South Asia. It's a bit hard to handle in captivity due to the fact that it does what it's known to do: be a snake that likes to kill stuff. Look at this cutie! However, there is no such thing as a "reticulated R" in the wild.
